MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the EH7 postcode area of Edinburgh. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 2:50pm due to a fault with the underground cable network that is causing fuses to blow at the local substation and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 3:04 PM on Thursday, 03 December 2020.
